name: Jellyfin Branding
description: Universal branding plugin that allows replacing Jellyfin branding with custom names, logos, icons, and assets without modifying core files.
overview: Customize your Jellyfin instance branding with your own application name, favicon, touch icons, banners, splash screens, and PWA manifest. Simply place your assets in a branding folder and configure via the admin panel.

versions.changelog: Initial beta release with complete branding customization support
